trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Cedar Hill
There were no other sightings in Cedar Hill on or around August 24th 2013
Summary: Silver cigar shape object was flying - stopped for about 2 secs then continued.
divs: Sighting DetailsHusband and I, Cedar Hill, TX., in back yard and noticed a large silver cigar shaped object in sky. No wings and no sound. It came to a complete stop then contined flying southwest towards Mansfield, TX.
